title: Apple has sent out WWDC22 invitations to members of the press
content:
It’s official — Apple has finally sent out WWDC22 invitations to members of the press. The anticipated event will likely include a first look at the upcoming iOS 16, watchOS 9, and macOS 13. That’s in addition to the potential release of the first Developer Betas of these operating systems, after the main keynote concludes.

The post Apple has sent out WWDC22 invitations to members of the press appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has finally sent out WWDC22 invitations to members of the press. Here's everything you need to know about this software-focused event.
